description: Registry of all available n8n workflow functions for ephemeral deployment

functions.name: Gmail to AI Notes Processor
functions.description: Monitors Gmail inbox for AI note-taking app transcripts, extracts content from links, processes with Gemini AI, and creates Google Tasks

functions.name: Google Maps Lead Generator
functions.description: Searches Google Maps for businesses by query, scrapes contact information, saves to Google Sheets, and sends Telegram notifications

functions.name: LinkedIn Lead Generator with Enrichment
functions.description: Searches LinkedIn for prospects using Apify, enriches profiles with Proxycurl, personalizes outreach with AI, and manages campaigns
functions.notes: Respects LinkedIn ToS by using official APIs. Includes rate limiting and unsubscribe links.

categories.name: Data Extraction & Processing
categories.description: Functions that extract, parse, and process data from various sources

categories.name: Lead Generation & Outreach
categories.description: Functions that find, enrich, and contact potential leads

categories.name: Notifications & Alerts
categories.description: Functions that send notifications via Telegram, Slack, email, etc.
